text:
"Bapu tere karke main pairan te khalo gaya,
Tu cycle' an te katti Te main gaddi joga ho gaya " :)
Remember this ?? All those nighout's just to pass in our MTH courses . Damn those nights were lit . Na notes hamara tha na kuch samaj aati thi xD . All the best Jassi . Dual mein dassa leke Placements faad ke aana .
author: Chindirala  Sasank

text:
For the love of God Never trust this woman when she says 'Shayad' :) 
I know it is hard to accept but unlike me you are not the best KillJoy in the whole world but you are a really sweet and cool person to spend time with . Remember , you should carry me to Gold in the next episode . I wish you have a great year ahead (Placements mein chaapke aana) and all that's in line for you . All the best dude !!!
P.S : Thanks for all those beautifully written MTH notes which we got photocopied from you . Pata bhi nahi kaise pass ho gaye the hum haha
author: Chindirala  Sasank
